post.title: J-PAL Blog: Julia Guerra Fernandes, J-PAL '17, on public safety and evidence use in Brazil
post.excerpt: Julia Guerra in an interview for the Alumni Spotlight series of J-PAL/MIT Latin America. During the interview, Julia also shared how this journey led to the founding of Leme, alongside her partners Joana Monteiro and Laura Schiavon.
post.content: Julia Guerra in an interview for the Alumni Spotlight series of J-PAL/MIT Latin America. During the interview, Julia also shared how this journey led to the founding of Leme, alongside her partners Joana Monteiro and Laura Schiavon.
